name: Gorilla Slam 2022
description:
Gorilla Slam
Description:
When a gorilla comes to the city it is up to him to become the greatest fighter. Defeat pro-boxers in the
city and prove yourself worthy.
Controls
A – move left
S – slam
D – move right
E - punch
SPACE – jump
Artists – Michaela Kidwell, Kylie Grillo
Programmers – Blake Rubadue, Fabrizio Coronel
Sound Designer – Ethan Wahl
